channel.title: Is there any to make a server without a router?
channel.description:
Is there any way to do this? Please don't say "go buy a router" and such, I CANT afford one. There has got to be a way to get my server online, cause runescape, I KNOW they don't have 100+ routers for each server. (sorry. Its upsetting that people can't make a server unless they got dsl only)
Please help me, ~Dart Zamaki~

item.title: Is there any to make a server without a router?
item.dc:creator: @cj_howat cj_howat@hotmail.com
item.description:
@cj_howat wrote:

yea u can make without a router or utorrent or any of that crap, lol i have 1 and its good, no utorrent no router, no portforwarding, just no-ip and classpath and other

Read full topic
item.source: Is there any to make a server without a router?

Seriously guys, how could I do this? (im sorry)
